thread.title: WATCH: Miami coach Jim Larranaga gets down after knocking off No. 18 Virginia
thread.title_full: WATCH: Miami coach Jim Larranaga gets down after knocking off No. 18 Virginia

author: Kyle Boone
title: WATCH: Miami coach Jim Larranaga gets down after knocking off No. 18 Virginia
text:
32m ago • 1 min read 
The Miami Hurricanes reeled off their third straight win Monday in upset fashion over Virginia , which prompted coach Jim Larrañaga to drop some sick dance moves in the locker room. 
Check it out above. Groovy, baby! 
The Hurricanes took the No. 18 Cavaliers to the brink on the road, sending it to overtime before closing it out in in extra time, 54-48. 
The game was anything but an offensive shootout. Virginia shot just 31 percent from the floor, while Miami was only marginally better at 37 percent. So we know he wasn’t dancing about his team’s offense. 
But this is a crucial win for the Hurricanes, and Larrañaga knew it. 
Miami still has some work to do to secure an NCAA Tournament bid. With three tough games left -- against Duke , Virginia Tech and Florida State -- this emotional win could springboard the Hurricanes toward the Big Dance. Add a comment
